Name: HB Retail incl CA
Expression: TM1IGNORE_BADTUPLES {UNION(TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(TM1DRILLDOWNMEMBER(TM1FILTERBYPATTERN(TM1SUBSETALL([Locations]) , "HB RETAIL") , ALL , RECURSIVE) , 0) , TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(TM1DRILLDOWNMEMBER(TM1FILTERBYPATTERN(TM1SUBSETALL([Locations]) , "HBH California LLC") , ALL , RECURSIVE) , 0))}
